description:
### 11.185 owdenoise

Apply Overcomplete Wavelet denoiser.

The filter accepts the following options:

**depth**

    Set depth. Larger depth values will denoise lower frequency components more, but slow down filtering. Must be an int in the range 8-16, default is 8. 

**luma_strength, ls**

    Set luma strength. Must be a double value in the range 0-1000, default is 1.0. 

**chroma_strength, cs**

    Set chroma strength. Must be a double value in the range 0-1000, default is 1.0.
name: owdenoise

options.description:
Set depth.

Larger depth values will denoise lower frequency components more, but slow down filtering.

Must be an int in the range 8-16, default is 8.
options.name: depth

options.description:
Set luma strength.

Must be a double value in the range 0-1000, default is 1.0.
options.name: luma_strength

options.description:
Set chroma strength.

Must be a double value in the range 0-1000, default is 1.0.
options.name: chroma_strength
